title: Native Tokens
description: Native Tokens is a custom, user-defined tokens. Fungible tokens, called native tokens, are minted and melted in token foundries. You can think of them as of a custom currency. The list of Native Tokens in Basic, Alias, NFT and Foundry Outputs is replaced by a Native Token Feature that holds a single Native Token which can only be present in Basic and Foundry Outputs.
